EmailTemplate.name: DRE-AbbVie RSS updates-v1
EmailTemplate.subject: Doctor Evidence RSS Alerts Available - AbbVie Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Doctor Evidence RSS Alerts Available|*
Doctor Evidence RSS Alerts Available - AbbVie Newsletter
Did you see December's AbbVie Newsletter?
Doctor Evidence has integrated the literature searches via RSS alerts. Click on the link below to contact library@abbvie.com about your subscription to Library News, the monthly electronic digest from the AbbVie Library.
Celebration of Science Posters: Data Visualizations
The AbbVie Library participated in the Celebration of Science with poster sessions in both LU and LC. The teams presented and discussed the Library’s data visualization capabilities. See both posters by going to the Library’s visualization page. To get more information about the Library’s visualization services, email library@abbvie.com.
Keep Current with New Doctor Evidence Alerts
New! Get extended coverage of drug therapy and diseases in the areas of HCV, immunology and endometriosis through the Library’s new Doctor Evidence alerts. Subscribe to any of the 15 new alerts, such as:
Adult Crohn's Disease - Drug Therapies [Doctor Evidence] Endometriosis Cost of Illness / Comparative Economic Evaluation [Doctor Evidence] HCV DAA [Doctor Evidence] … and more!
Visit the Library’s alert page to see a complete list. For more information, email library@abbvie.com.
Users can now log in through AbbVie's single Sign On portal at: https://federation.abbvie.com/idp/startSSO.ping?PartnerSpId=dre-launch:saml2:sp
